name.english: Don Krieg's Golden Wootz Steel Armor

keyMoments.title: Armor Destroyed by Luffy
keyMoments.description: Don Krieg's supposedly indestructible golden Wootz Steel armor is cracked and then shattered by Luffy's consecutive Gomu Gomu no Bazooka attacks.
keyMoments.significance: The destruction of Krieg's armor symbolizes the fall of his power and invincibility.

description: Don Krieg's golden armor made of Wootz Steel, weighing one ton. It was considered indestructible and was a symbol of Krieg's power and defense.

keyMoments.title: Given to Krieg Pirates
keyMoments.description: Sanji gives the Baratie's supply ship to the defeated Krieg Pirates to ensure they have provisions and means of transport.
keyMoments.significance: Represents Sanji's philosophy that no one should starve, even defeated enemies.

description: A supply ship belonging to the Baratie restaurant, used for transporting provisions.
